module.name: groups
module.description: The groups module takes care of permissions in Fork CMS. For easy management, multiple groups can be created, where a different set of permissions for the Fork CMS backend can be applied to. The exact permissions of the user will be the combined result of all permissions set of the groups the user is part of. It is possible to easily set the correct permissions for e.g. an administrator to administer the settings and a group of editors to take care of the content.
